prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has sleek, dragon-like features and shimmering scales.
I want a legendary Pokemon that can control dimensions and appears majestic with its design.
Generate an elegant Pokemon with a unique blend of purple and white colors, featuring impressive wings.
Make a dragon Pokemon that embodies space and time, showcasing powerful energy in its form.
Imagine a mythical creature that rules over the oceans with its incredible speed and strength.
Design a quadruped Pokemon that has a refined shape and can teleport through dimensions effortlessly.
Show me a Pokemon with a celestial theme, emphasizing its divine origin through unique color patterns.

distinctive_features: Unique shape resembling a space deity
